abstract: Rory McIlroy will not compete in Bridgestone Invitational golf tournament because of ankle injury.
lead_paragraph: McIlroy has told the PGA Tour he will not play the Bridgestone Invitational in Akron, Ohio, next week as he recovers from a left ankle injury he sustained while playing soccer in early July.

headline.main: Rory McIlroy Will Sit Out Bridgestone

snippet: McIlroy has told the PGA Tour he will not play the Bridgestone Invitational in Akron, Ohio, next week as he recovers from a left ankle injury he sustained while playing soccer in early July.
